uiCommands

Interface Command<Type>

  • Type Parameters:
    Type - the type of User Interface that the commands are designed for.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Singleton<Command<Type>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddClient, AddCreditCard, AddCustomer, AddPlay, ExitApplication, Help, ListAllClients, ListAllCustomers, ListAllPlays, RemoveClient, RemoveCreditCard, RemoveCustomer, RetrieveData, StoreData

    public interface Command<Type>
extends Singleton<Command<Type>>
    Interface for Commands
    Author:
    Joshua Zierman [py1422xs@metrostate.edu]

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void call(Type ui)
      Executes the action associated with the command.
      java.lang.String getLabel()
      Gets a label to show to user describing the command.
      boolean isDataCommand()
      Checks to see if the command accesses data.
      boolean isTerminationCommand()
      Checks to see if the command terminates the application.

      • Methods inherited from interface singleton.Singleton

        readResolve

    • Method Detail

      • getLabel

        java.lang.String getLabel()
        Gets a label to show to user describing the command.
        Returns:
        the label.

      • call

        void call(Type ui)
        Executes the action associated with the command.
        Parameters:
        ui - a user interface

      • isDataCommand

        boolean isDataCommand()
        Checks to see if the command accesses data.
        Returns:
        true if the command accesses data, else false.

      • isTerminationCommand

        boolean isTerminationCommand()
        Checks to see if the command terminates the application.
        Returns:
        true if the command is supposed to close the application.
